pageProduct.name: Olay Mist Ultimate Hydration Essence Energizing 98ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Mist Ultimate Hydration Essence Energizing With Vitamin C & Bergamot

Need a boost? Transform tired looking skin with Olay Energizing Mist Face Spray. When skin feels exhausted, wake up its senses with the revitalizing and hydrating benefits of a Vitamin C, Bergamot and Vitamin B3 mist. Every cloudlike mist instantly quenches and energizes, leaving your face looking bright and makeup looking refreshed. With Olay Mists in your skin care routine, formulated with botanical ingredients and fresh fragrances, you'll do more than hydrate-you'll transport your senses and your mind.

Size: 98mL

KEY FEATURES

• Olay Mist Energizing 12/3.3 OZ REM
• Hydrating glow: Facial mist instantly absorbs to hydrate dull, dry & tight skin
• Energizing spray: Microfine mist of Vitamin C & Bergamot helps wake up skin instantly
• Vitamin C & Bergamot: Helps revitalize, refresh & energize skin to look bright & recharged
• Quenches skin: Replenishing water lost during the day, Olay Mists instantly increases hydration by 60% for skin that glows
• On the go hydration: Use throughout the day for an instant boost in hydration
• Free & Clear: No oils, parabens & artificial colors or dyes

Warnings

Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water

Ingredients

Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Verbena Officinalis Leaf Extract, PEG-32, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Disodium EDTA, Aminomethyl Propanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance

Directions

Apply before your moisturizer, following makeup application, or anytime you need a pick me up. Hold product 12-24 cm from face, close eyes and spray
